column15: Buy original Portronics My Buddy+ - POR704 at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Portronics My Buddy+ POR 704 Laptop Stand is a multi utility laptop cooler desk that allows you to use the laptop in the best of the postures depending on the height of the person and also cool the laptop while you using it on your bed. MY-Buddy Laptop Desk Cooler can be used with any size of the laptop and the same can be folded and carried anywhere. Portronics My Buddy+ POR 704 Laptop Stand has fans attached on the wooden panel with 1800 RPM speed with the power of 2W and the power for the fan is extracted through the USB of the laptop so no use of any power plugs.

Specifications:

  • Brand: Portronics
  • Model No: POR 704
  • Type: Cooling Pad
  • Fan: Yes Included
  • Compatible with: 7 inch
  • Weight: 2 Kg
  • Warranty: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty
  • What's in the Box (?): Main Unit Warranty Card
